name: JC pinterest pin
author: Rajiv Shakya (JyashaCreations )

sections.description: Jc pinterest pin is the Social Plugin. It Shows the Pinterest Pin Widget in your WordPress Site When Visitors Press the Button. By this You can Show Your Favorite pin Easily . Its Automatically Display When page Load. It will work based on shortcode [jc-pin]
sections.installation:
To install JC Pinterst Pin:

  1. Upload the ‘jc-pinterest-pin’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Administer in menu -> Pinterest Pin Settings
